page.title: 14A DAY IN MY LIFE (cont)
page.content: {(cont from p.13) When we arrived at the show I went and walked the Nursery Stakes Course. The Nursery Stakes is where you ride your horse round a jumping course.The jumps are about 2 feet high. First of all I jumped round the jumps and I had a clear round.I then went round on my brother's pony.I again had a clear round and went into the jump-off.This is where you jump the course against the clock. First I went round on my brothers pony and went into the lead.Then I went round on my pony and came second.I won it on Tim's pony.I went in to collect my rosette,after receiving it I cantered round the ring.I gave Tim,my brother,his pony back.I put my pony in the horse-box and then waited for Tim. {(cont p.15)
